name: 3D Pong (Single-player)
description:
Welcome to our simplified 3D Pong inspired by the classic Pong game! 

Our game is built using the Unity engine, and all of the tiles and bouncing apparatus are 3D creations made in Blender. In this game, players will control the paddle trying to score points while preventing the ball ball dropping out . 

The game features simple controls (mouse or keyboard), redesgined graphics. Whether you're a longtime fan of Pong or just looking for a fun way to pass the time, we think you should give this game a try. 

So grab your paddle and let's get bouncing!
